Battle\TU_CAT.msbt
TU_CAT_T	Bane Skills
TU_CAT_000	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Bane Skills \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffactivate a Session against\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0specific classes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, such as Dragon or\nHorseback, regardless of affinities.\n\nFor example, "Horseslayer" will always\ntrigger a Session as long as the enemy\nis a Horseback Mirage.\n\nNote that Bane Skills have a normal \nweapon affinity.
Battle\TU_CHG.msbt
TU_CHG_T	Change
TU_CHG_000	By selecting \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0CHANGE during a battle,\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you can swap a cast member \ncurrently fighting alongside Itsuki with\na cast member who is in the Sub Cast\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nMake use of this when you can't attack\nan enemy's weakness or when\na cast member's health is dangerously low,\nin order to strategically fight your battles.
Battle\TU_CHM.msbt
TU_CHM_T	Charm
TU_CHM_000	When an ally is afflicted with \nthe \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status ailment Charm, \nhe or she will be uncontrollable \nand perform random actions\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \nsuch as attacking allies and\nusing healing items on enemies.\n\nThe character will also be susceptible\nto being entranced by the enemy.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Note that while afflicted with Charm,\nhe or she will be unable to participate\nin Sessions.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n\nThis ailment may heal over time, \nbut if an ally is afflicted with Charm, \nit is best to treat him or her with \nan item or a skill as soon as possible.
Battle\TU_CLS.msbt
TU_CLS_T	Seal
TU_CLS_000	When you are afflicted with the status ailment \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Seal\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, you will be \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0unable to use your skills\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0The cast member's abilities will also\nbe weakened, and he or she will be\nunable to participate in Sessions\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThis effect may heal over time, \nbut remember that if an ally is Sealed,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0he or she will remain in that state after\nthe battle ends\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
Battle\TU_DUO.msbt
TU_DUO_T	Duo Arts
TU_DUO_000	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Duo Arts are powerful performances \nthat may activate during a Session\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nAt times, a cut-in will occur during\na long Session. When this happens,\npress \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0d\0 or \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0e\0 to activate Duo Arts.\n\nDuo Arts\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0 will enable you to connect\nadditional Sessions, ignoring the enemy's\ndefensive resistance\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff! 
Battle\TU_ELE.msbt
TU_ELE_T	Aim for Weaknesses
TU_ELE_000	Both allies and enemies have defensive\nresistances with each magic and \nweapon affinity. If you attack an enemy \nwith an affinity that it has a strong defense\nagainst, you will not be able to inflict\na large amount of damage.\n\nOn the contrary, if you attack an enemy\nwith a weapon or a magic element that \nit is weak against, "WEAK!" will appear\non the screen and you will be able to\ninflict more damage than usual.
Battle\TU_ESC.msbt
TU_ESC_T	Escape
TU_ESC_000	Selecting ESCAPE will prompt \nyour party to attempt to flee from battle. \n\nNote, however, that if you are unsuccessful\nwith an attempt you will forfeit a round of\naction.
Battle\TU_FLM.msbt
TU_FLM_T	Burning
TU_FLM_000	You have been struck by Medeus's flames\nand are now suffering from the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status\nailment Burning\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nWhen you are afflicted with Burning,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you incur damage every time you \nperform an action\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nIn addition, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0your defensive resistance \nto Fire elements will be decreased, \ncausing Fire attacks to do much\nmore damage to you\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThis is an extremely dangerous state, \nas \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you also cannot participate in Sessions\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \nso quickly heal yourself with an item or \na skill!
Battle\TU_GDS.msbt
TU_GDS_T	Using Items
TU_GDS_000	The ITEMS command will enable you \nto use items in your inventory to perform \nactions such as healing yourself. \n\nNote: Items that are used will be lost.
Battle\TU_GRD.msbt
TU_GRD_T	Damage
TU_GRD_000	The green-and-red colored bars displayed\nto the right of the screen represent \nthe remaining amount of health for \neach party member.\n\nWhen a character's health decreases to 0,\nhe or she will go unconscious and be\nunable to fight. \n\nIf every party member's health reaches 0,\nit will be game over.\n\nSelecting GUARD during your turn \nwill decrease the amount of damage \nyou receive during that round.
Battle\TU_MAS.msbt
TU_MAS_T	Learning Skills
TU_MAS_000	When the weapon "\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Carnage\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff" is equipped\nand used by a character in battle,\nits Mastery level will increase.\n\nWhen a Carnage's Mastery is maxed out,\nthe character will learn a new skill.
Battle\TU_MIR.msbt
TU_MIR_T	Special Performances
TU_MIR_000	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Special Performances\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff can now be used!\n\nSpecial Performances are skills that use\nthe \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0SP Gauge\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff located in the upper right\nof the screen.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Special Performances can trigger Sessions\nwhile ignoring affinities, and many have \npowerful effects unlike any other skills\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe SP Gauge will fill as you perform\nactions or connect Sessions during a\nbattle.
Battle\TU_MND.msbt
TU_MND_T	Mind Surge
TU_MND_000	While you are inflicted with the status \nailment \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mind Surge\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0your EP will decrease\nevery time you perform an action\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThis ailment may heal over time, \nbut if you are afflicted with Mind Surge,\nit is best to treat it with an item or \na skill as soon as possible.
Battle\TU_OVK.msbt
TU_OVK_T	Overkill
TU_OVK_001	Since the enemy's remaining HP\ndecreased to 0 during a Session,\nan \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Overkill\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff occurred!\n\nWhen an Overkill is active, the remaining\nattacks in that Session will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0ignore\nthe enemy's Resist/Null/Repel/Drain\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
Battle\TU_PNC.msbt
TU_PNC_T	Confuse
TU_PNC_000	When a party member is afflicted with the \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status ailment Confuse, he or she will not follow \ncommands nor join in any Sessions, but will \ninstead perform random actions\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff such as attack \nan ally, use a healing item on an enemy, or at \ntimes, do nothing at all.\n\nThis ailment may heal over time, but if an ally is\nafflicted with Confuse, it is best to treat him or\nher with an item or a skill as soon as possible.
Battle\TU_PSN.msbt
TU_PSN_T	Poison
TU_PSN_000	When you are afflicted with the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status \nailment Poison, you will incur damage \nat the start of the character's turn\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nAdditionally, if an ally remains afflicted\nwith Poison \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0he or she will continue to\nincur damage following the battle with\nevery step taken on the field\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \nso it is best to treat him or her with \nan item or a skill as soon as possible.
Battle\TU_RGK.msbt
TU_RGK_T	Sessions (Special Conditions)
TU_RGK_001	Some Radiant Skills give \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0weapon skills \na special effect, enabling the skill to trigger\na Session when it is used on an enemy \nwith a certain status ailment, regardless of\nthat enemy's defensive resistance.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffThis condition has been met, so you can \nnow begin a Session with that effect.\n\nTry to activate this effect during battle!
Battle\TU_SES.msbt
TU_SES_T	Sessions
TU_SES_000	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0When an enemy's weakness is attacked \nwith a skill, an ally who possesses \na Session Skill corresponding to that skill \nwill perform a follow-up attack. \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffThis is called a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Session\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe attacks that make up a Session inflict more \ndamage than a single, normal attack, so it is \ncrucial that you target an enemy's weakness \nand connect several Sessions together often! 
TU_SES_001	The new Session Skill "\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Elec-Lunge\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff" triggers\noff of an Elec affinity skill; in this case, it can\nperform a Session with Itsuki's \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Zio\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nTry attacking an enemy's weakness \nwith Itsuki's Zio!
Battle\TU_SES2.msbt
TU_SES2_T	Session Skills
TU_SES2_000	You have learned the Session Skill \n"\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Elec-Lunge\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff."\n\nYou will now be able to perform Sessions\nduring a battle.
Battle\TU_SKL.msbt
TU_SKL_T	Skills
TU_SKL_000	Learning skills will enable you to perform\nattacks of various affinities, \nas well as more powerful weapon attacks. \n\nNote that skills use EP, \nwhich can only be replenished by \nspecific items or a healing spot.
Battle\TU_SLP.msbt
TU_SLP_T	Sleep
TU_SLP_000	When you are affected by the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status ailment \nSleep, you will be unable to perform any actions.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffIn addition, the attacks you receive will always \nbe critical.\n\nThis ailment may heal over time but if \nan ally is afflicted with Sleep, \nit is best to heal him or her with \nan item or a skill as soon as possible.
Battle\TU_SSB.msbt
TU_SSB_T	Side Stories (Defeat Set Number of Enemies)
TU_SSB_000	This type of side story requires a specific\ncast member to defeat a set number of\na certain type of enemy to progress.\n\nIn addition to those enemies directly\ndefeated by the cast member,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0any enemies defeated during a Session\nin which the cast member participated\nwill also count toward the set number of\nenemies required to be defeated\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
Battle\TU_STN.msbt
TU_STN_T	Stun
TU_STN_000	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0When a cast member is afflicted with\nthe status ailment Stun, he or she will not\nbe able to take action or participate in\nSessions for that round.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n\nThis condition will naturally heal at\nthe start of the character's next turn,\nhowever during that time enemy attacks\nwill more than likely result in critical hits.
Battle\TU_TAC.msbt
TU_TAC_T	TACTICS
TU_TAC_001	In the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0TACTICS menu\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff you can determine\nhow Itsuki's allies will act during battle. \n\nIf any tactic other than commanding \na character individually is chosen, \nthat cast member will act according \nto the tactic assigned to him or her.\n\nA tactic can be set by pressing \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0, \nand it can be canceled by pressing \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x08\0.\n\nNote that the set tactic will have \nno effect during auto-battle,\nand it cannot be changed \nuntil Itsuki's next turn.
Battle\TU_ZMB.msbt
TU_ZMB_T	Zombie
TU_ZMB_000	When an ally is afflicted with\nthe \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0status ailment Zombie,\nhe or she will incur damage with\nevery action, be unable to participate in\nSessions, and will not follow commands\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe character will also attack allies.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Allies that are attacked will also be afflicted\nwith Zombie\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, so it is best to treat him or her\nwith an item or a skill as soon as possible.

Common\CharaProfileHistoryMsg.msbt
PROFILE_MSG_000	Dummy Message
PROFILE_MSG_001	★He hasn't done anything showbiz\n   related in particular. Tsubasa is\n   happy to keep him updated on the\n   industry, but he himself has no real\n   interest in it.
PROFILE_MSG_002	★After a series of strange events,\n   he joins Fortuna Entertainment as\n   a performer-in-training.
PROFILE_MSG_003	★He works as a model for a\n   men's fashion magazine.
PROFILE_MSG_004	★He accomplishes his job as\n   the backing chorus at Mamori\n   Minamoto's recital show.
PROFILE_MSG_005	★He appears in the stylish\n   crime action TV show "Sneeze\n   Detective Maho," directed by\n   the master auteur\n   Kuen Tarachino.
PROFILE_MSG_006	★He accomplishes his job as a\n   stand-in at Enter-Kingdom's\n   Musical Fes.
PROFILE_MSG_007	★He acts as the Hero-King Marth in\n   the Opera of Light "Fire Emblem,"\n   and puts an end to the battle\n   against Mirages!
PROFILE_MSG_008	★He writes the Uta-loid song\n   "This World Isn't an Illusion."\n   After its anonymous upload online,\n   it gained unexpected popularity,\n   and his song is called a\n   masterpiece.
PROFILE_MSG_009	-

PROFILE_MSG_032	DUMMY MESSAGE
PROFILE_MSG_033	★She participates in One of Millennium,\n   the idol audition at Daitama Observatory.
PROFILE_MSG_034	★She is recruited by Maiko Shimazaki\n   and joins Fortuna Entertainment.

MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_LORD	Lord Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_MASTER_LORD	Exalted noble commanding respect and loyalty. With balanced power, they heal and support allies.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_OVER_LORD	A ruthless warlord who seeks battle and conquest. Excels in offense, defense, and Sword skills.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_PEGASUS	Pegasus Knight Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_FALCON	A traditional and dutiful rider heroine. Balances mercy and power with Healing and Force skills.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_DRAGON	A confident, bold rider heroine. Dominates the battlefield with debuffs and Lance skills.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_KNIGHT	Cavalier Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_PALADIN	A strong and reliable comrade. Balanced and versatile, they adapt to aid in any situation.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_D_KNIGHT	A roguish knight-errant. Uses fire and debuffs to cloud the battlefield and confound foes.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_WITCH	Dark Mage Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_SAGE	A mysterious, ethereal maiden. Wields both new curative magic and refined destructive spells.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_SORCERESS	An eerie master of the occult. With ruinous magic, they raze the field with sheer arcane might.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_ARCHER	Archer Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_SNIPER	A gallant master marksman. Expert archery lets them pierce all foes in a single shot.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_ASSASSIN	A lethal agent of darkness. Adept at Elec skills and at terrorizing foes from the shadows.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_ARMOR	Knight Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_GENERAL	A stalwart and sturdy protector. Endures all through unbreakable defense and healing skills.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_BERSERKER	An unruly, destructive brigand. Offense excels over defense, for a merciless assault.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_SWORDMAN	Myrmidon Help (DUMMY)
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_HERO	The classical champion of heroism. Balanced abilities, with skill in offense and support.
MIRAGE_CLASS_HELP_S_MASTER	A maverick master of the blade. All Sword skills come naturally to this paragon of swordplay.

RECORD_HELP_B_341	Won 50 battles without Itsuki in the main cast.
RECORD_HELP_B_342	Won 100 battles with an all-female main cast.
RECORD_HELP_B_344	Won a battle with Itsuki in The President and Tsubasa and Kiria in Stellar Grace.
RECORD_HELP_B_345	Won a battle with Itsuki in regular clothes and Tsubasa and Ellie in street fashion.

AS_ITSUKI_2	Raises the power of Bane Skills.

AS_TSUBASA_2	Raises Hit & Evade.
AS_TOUMA_1	Chance of lowering target's Defense by 50% \nwhen attacking.
AS_TOUMA_2	Greatly raises the power of Magic attacks.

DLC_APPLY_TTL_TITLE	Downloadable Content Warning
DLC_APPLY_TTL_MAIN	To access a downloadable event or\ndungeon, you must \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0progress to a certain\npoint within the main story\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nTo access a downloadable costume, you\nmust have the cast member in your party\nand be able to change his or her costume.
DLC_DELETE_TTL_TITLE	Deleting Downloadable Content
DLC_DELETE_TTL_MAIN	When you delete downloadable content,\nyou will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0not be able to access those\nevents, dungeons, and/or costumes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nTo play with this content again, you must\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0download it again from Nintendo eShop\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.

Ending\AfterStory.msbt
AFTERSTORY_TBS_C	Tsubasa never quite got over her\nanxieties. However, her earnest efforts\nearned her the hearts of her fans.\nShe gained great success, her fans\ncalling her the "idol we want to\nprotect." Much to Tsubasa's surprise,\nthere seems to be a project in the\nworks to have her form a duo with her\nsister.
AFTERSTORY_TBS_B	Being spokesmodel for Enter-Kingdom\nworked wonders for her career, and her\npopularity has grown rapidly since then.\nStill, however famous she gets, she\ncontinues to hold meet-and-greets and\nnever forgets her gratitude to her fans.
AFTERSTORY_TBS_A	With her devilish charm and "Tsubasa's\nKiss," Tsubasa wins the public's heart.\nThe catchphrase becomes one of the most\ntrending topics of the year, and she wins\nan award for Best Commercial. Her acting\nabilities on Maho were also highly\npraised, and she wins more and more\nroles as the days go by...
AFTERSTORY_TBS_S	Thanks to "Fly: You're My Wind," she won\nvarious awards starting with Rookie of\nthe Year, and left her name in history\nas a legendary idol. However, she wasn't\nsatisfied just with that, and continues\nto work hard during her lessons, aiming\nfor even greater heights.
AFTERSTORY_TMA_C	After Enter-Kingdom, Touma continued his\nwork playing extras in live shows, slowly\nincreasing his reputation. Eventually, he\ncaught the attention of a famed producer\nwho cast him as the star of one such\nshow. Touma works hard, hoping to one day\nfind his chance to become the hero he's\nalways dreamed of.
AFTERSTORY_TMA_B	Touma continued his training even after\nEnter-Kingdom. Taking advantage of his\nphysical abilities, Touma becomes a stunt\ndouble, and a crucial part of Japanese\nlive-action cinema. Though the audience\nmay never see the face behind the mask,\nTouma continues to fight as a hero.
AFTERSTORY_TMA_A	With his charming performance, Touma\ngrasped the hearts of many female fans,\nand made a name as one of the most\nattractive male actors in the business.\nThough he found unexpected success in\nJapanese romantic cinema, he still\ndreams of heroism, and trains for his\nchance at the next Masqueraider\naudition...
AFTERSTORY_TMA_S	After appearing as "Masqueraider Ouga,"\nTouma found great success as an action\nstar. He eventually wrote, directed, and\nstarred in his own hero movie, which was\nacclaimed for its action scenes...\nparticularly those between Touma and his\ncostar, the up-and-coming Riku Suzumoto.
AFTERSTORY_KRA_C	After Enter-Kingdom, Kiria energetically\ncontinued her music career. Her powerful\nvoice and grand performances continue to\nmesmerize her many fans, and she continues\nher busy life as one of the top artists\nin the country.
AFTERSTORY_KRA_B	After Enter-Kingdom, Kiria's songs\nstayed faithful to her cool personality,\nand she remained a charismatic figure in\nthe Japanese music industry. However,\nthough it doesn't quite suit her public\nimage, it's said she always carries\naround a small beat-up plush doll,\ninexpertly stitched back together...
AFTERSTORY_KRA_A	"Chloe," the MC of the program\n"Absolutely Cute!" played by Kiria,\nbecame a huge hit, and Kiria made the\ndecision to switch her image to a more\nhip and cute one. Now, surrounded by\nthe cuteness she loves, Kiria seems\nhappier than ever.
AFTERSTORY_KRA_S	Kiria's new style of being "cool and\ncute" becomes popular across the world,\nmaking her an international star. The\nJapanese for the trend, "kakkokawaii,"\nenters common parlance across languages,\nand Kiria's voice continues to spread\nthroughout the world.
AFTERSTORY_ELY_C	Her performance during Musical Fes\ngathered attention, and she appeared in\nplays more and more often. Although she\nbecame a renowned performer in the\nJapanese theatrical world, her passion\nto reach Hollywood one day is still\ngoing strong…
AFTERSTORY_ELY_B	After "Dandelion in Love," Eleonora grew\nin popularity as a biracial star. Her\nfun personality was a hit among viewers,\nand she began appearing on more talk\nshows. She will soon be going to\nHollywood to appear in a long-running\nTV show, but she is not sure how to\nfeel about it.
AFTERSTORY_ELY_A	Although Tarachino invited her to\nHollywood, she decided the time wasn't\nright, and declined the offer. In order\nto become an actress worthy of Hollywood,\nEleonora continues to train tirelessly,\nand appears in shows of many genres.\nThe day of her departure may come soon...
AFTERSTORY_ELY_S	Tarachino's movie, "Arrow of Destiny,"\nbecame a box office hit worldwide, and\nEleonora fulfilled her dream of winning\nBest Actress. International fame soon\nfollowed, and she travels the world for\ncountless shoots and movies... though\non her off time, she can always be found\nback in Japan.
AFTERSTORY_MMR_C	Upon graduating elementary school,\nMamori went on hiatus from show business.\nAlthough she continues to train to sing\nand dance, she has a hard time catching\nup on all the schoolwork she's missed.\nItsuki and the other members of Fortuna\ngladly tutor her whenever time allows.
AFTERSTORY_MMR_B	Her performance at Music Fes impressed\nmany, and she was able to release a CD\nas Mamorin, her idol persona. Her debut\nsingle was a huge hit among younger\naudiences and soon became a staple\nchildren's song.
AFTERSTORY_MMR_A	Her skits in "Microwavin' with Mamorin"\nwere well received, and she was offered\na part in a drama. Her heartfelt acting touched\nnot only the audience, but the film crew\nas well. As time went on, she began\nappearing in more and more TV shows and\nmovies, and it's said that wherever she\nis filming, a burly man can always be\nfound on set nearby.
AFTERSTORY_MMR_S	After performing in the Gold and Silver\nSinging Competition, she won the\nopportunity for her own concert in the\nprestigious Bugeikan hall. Though her\nfirst popularity came from the odd\ncombination of microwaving and ballads,\nnone could deny her singing ability,\nand she started a new ballad craze in\nJapan. The media dubs her "Japan's\ngranddaughter," and she is loved by all.
AFTERSTORY_YSR_C	After avenging his father, Yashiro\nannounced his retirement on the final\nday of his tour. Afterwards, he decided\nto travel the world. Several handwritten\npostcards arrive yearly at Fortuna, each\ncontaining pictures of Yashiro in new\nplaces, and each photo depicting him\nwith a peaceful smile. Many hope that\none day, he will return to the stage...
AFTERSTORY_YSR_B	After appearing on Mamori's show,\nYashiro learned the joy of food, and in\na startling move entirely separate from\nhis acting career, he opened a restaurant\ncalled Bistro Tsurugi. It gains fame\nfor its refined cuisine, and though his\nacting career keeps him busy, Yashiro\noccasionally appears in its kitchen\nto cook some of the dishes himself.
AFTERSTORY_YSR_A	After joining Fortuna Entertainment,\nYashiro began accepting jobs he normally\nwouldn't, and even appeared on talk\nshows. He showed sides of himself that\nhe'd never shown before, earning him his\ncritics' respect as a true Renaissance\nman. Yashiro Tsurugi continues to evolve\nas an artist...
AFTERSTORY_YSR_S	Later in life, Yashiro took it upon\nhimself to head a production of\n"The Pilgrimage of Heinrich," his\nfather's final production. He handled\nthe direction and music with usual\naplomb, and the tour found success\noverseas, boosting his fame as a model\nof Japanese entertainment. Despite\nfinding such great success at a young\nage, Yashiro never stops bettering\nhimself and his skills.
AFTERSTORY_TIK_C	After defeating the Shadow Dragon, Tiki\nand the others returned to their world,\nbut the Uta-loid Tiki still continued\nto receive updates and patches, and\nremained a cultural icon and favorite\nof the public. Tiki's popularity lasts\neven after Enter-Kingdom, and she\neventually becomes a virtual idol known\nworldwide.
AFTERSTORY_TIK_B	After Tiki and the others returned to\ntheir world, they wrote a record of their\nadventures in order to one day fulfill\ntheir promise to Itsuki—a story they\ncalled the Tome of Mirages. It spread all\nover their world, attracting interest\ntoward the performing arts.
AFTERSTORY_TIK_A	Tiki and the others returned to their\nworld and committed their adventures to\na script. Their singing and acting was\nadmittedly clumsy, but the denizens of\ntheir world applauded their efforts, and\nit became the first step in reviving the\narts in their lands. Wherever the group\nwent, a new delicacy was introduced to\nthe locals almost overnight: a fried\nring of sweet dough.
AFTERSTORY_TIK_S	With the Shadow Dragon slain, Tiki and\nthe others returned to their world.\nThere, with everyone's help, Tiki held\na live concert. Before a massive audience,\nshe sings "This World Isn't an Illusion", a song\ntied to her memories of Itsuki, with all her heart.\nThe faint glimmer twinkling in the audience may\nbe the first new flicker of Performa...
AFTERSTORY_BRY_C	Barry continued to work hard as a trainer,\nbut he also wrote doujinshi and fan works\non the side. The manga he drew soon\nbecame a cult classic and was picked\nup by a publisher for a serialization.\nHis fans note that the heroine bears a\nstriking resemblance to Mamori Minamoto.
AFTERSTORY_BRY_B	Although he was an independent contractor,\nBarry eventually went Fortuna-exclusive.\nIn the many interviews of Fortuna's\ntalent and stars, Barry's powerful\npersonality and bombastic past would\ninvariably come up in conversation.\nBarry can still be heard passionately\nroaring encouragement for his students...\nsometimes from a couple blocks away.
AFTERSTORY_BRY_A	As Fortuna grew in fame, more outside\nrequests came in demanding Barry's expert\ntutelage. He earned the trust of many\nartists, and became known as a charismatic\nand passionate trainer. His problem now\nis that his rewarding career is getting\nin the way of his anime and video games.
AFTERSTORY_BRY_S	After composing his song for Mamori,\nBarry returned to his music career.\nThis news reaches his former bandmates\nacross the sea, and they try to\nconvince him to reclaim his death metal\ncrown. Barry opts instead to rebuild\nthe renowned "TERADETH" into an\nincredible anime music group.
AFTERSTORY_MIK_C	With Itsuki and Ayaha, Maiko continued\nsupporting Fortuna's growing stable of\ntalent with her ideal of creating a\ncasual environment. They tried to ban\ndrinking in the office, but Maiko\nadamantly opposed it, declaring that it \nwould "ruin everything she's worked for."
AFTERSTORY_MIK_B	After helping young talents succeed in\nshow business, she gained a reputation\nfor her knack for seeing the true\npotential in entertainers. Fortuna\nexpanded, and although she is busy\nmanaging it, she holds yearly auditions,\nand is always excited to see new talent.
AFTERSTORY_MIK_A	After the incident with Horinozawa,\nMaiko began considering a return to\nthe modeling business. After the issue\nof the Shadow Dragon was dealt with,\nshe started dieting more and more.\nThe release date of the next volume of\n"My Complex" may be closer than ever...
AFTERSTORY_MIK_S	After the success of her collaboration\nprojects, Maiko's reputation soared and\nshe garnered the attention of many media\noutlets. Fortuna became a household\nname, and thanks to Maiko's ingenuity\nand capabilities, the agency went on\nto produce even more new stars.
AFTERSTORY_MIK_SS	After stepping down, Maiko made a quick\ncomeback in the modeling industry. Soon\nenough, the third volume of "My Complex"\nwas published. The media dubbed her\n"Everyone's Big Sister," and she made\nmany appearances in magazines, TV, radio,\nand countless other platforms.
AFTERSTORY_ITK_S	Itsuki gained a newfound confidence\nafter playing the part of Marth in\n"Fire Emblem." In the aftermath of\nthe incident, he began to seriously\nconsider a career in show business.\nAfter many hardships, and many\nmemorable encounters, he will doubtless\ncontinue to shine as an artist...
AFTERSTORY_ITK_SS	Itsuki succeeded Maiko as president of\nFortuna Entertainment, and though his\nfirst days were a shaky start, he grew\nto lead Fortuna and its members to\nsuccess and fame. Perhaps this is what\nItsuki had truly learned from Chrom and\nhis friends; the leadership and strength\nof a Lord.
Event\debug_txt.msbt

006	(I sense a dangerous presence up ahead...\nWhat should I do?)

Event\event_tutorial.msbt
TOPIC_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Communication Tool: Topic
TOPIC_TUTORIAL_MAIN	Itsuki carries a communication tool with \nhim called \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Topic\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nAll Topic conversations are accessed through\nthe dedicated \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Topic screen\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nNormally, you open the Topic screen with \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x04\0,\nbut certain \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0story-critical messages \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffwill cause\nthe Topic screen to open up \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0automatically\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
FACILITY_TUTORIAL_TITLE	City Facilities
FACILITY_TUTORIAL_MAIN	You can purchase items in Shibuya.\n\nTapping MAP on the Topic screen \nwill open up the Shibuya auto-map,\nwhere you can view the locations of\nthe various facilities in the city.\n\nNumerous items can be bought at\nthe convenience store Hee Ho Mart. \nAccessories that strengthen your Armor \ncan be purchased at Jewelry Carabia.\n\nBe sure take advantage of these\nlocations depending on the situation.
INTERMISSTION_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Intermission
INTERMISSTION_TUTORIAL_MAIN	There is a period of time between \neach chapter called \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Intermission\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \nwhere nothing of significance will happen.\n\nDuring an Intermission, \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you can spend your time \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffdoing requests\nand side stories.\n\nYou can end an Intermission by \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0visiting the Uzume Lesson Studio\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
DRESS_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Costume Change
DRESS_TUTORIAL__MAIN	You can now \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0change your cast members' \ncostumes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nA cast member's costume can be changed\nby going to \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Wardrobe\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff in the menu. \n\nChanging costumes enables you \nto view your \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0cast members fighting in \ndifferent outfits\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nCostumes do not affect your cast members'\nperformance in battle, so go ahead and\nchoose your favorites!
SIDESTORY_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Side Stories
SIDESTORY_TUTORIAL_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Side stories \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffare the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0personal stories \nof your cast members\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff; they progress \nregardless of the story being told in \nthe current chapter. \n\nIn a side story, Itsuki will support \nhis friends in their showbiz pursuits\nand deepen his bonds with them.\n\nA side story will begin when \na cast member, whose \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Stage Rank \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\nhas reached a certain level, \nsends you an \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0invitation on Topic\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nYou can obtain skills in side stories \nthat will be useful in battle and \nyour investigations, so it is highly \nrecommended that you pursue them!
STAGERANK_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Increasing Stage Rank
STAGERANK_TUTORIAL_MAIN	There currently are no cast members \nwith whom you can undertake \na side story.\n\nIt is recommended that you \nuse Touma in combat and \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0increase his Stage Rank\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
Event\flag_on_1.msbt
001	Turn ON the Prologue flags,\nup to the start of Ch. 1.
002	Turn ON the Prologue to Ch. 1 flags,\nup to the start of Ch. 2.
003	Turn ON the Prologue to Ch. 2 flags,\nup to the start of Ch. 3.
004	Turn ON the Prologue to Ch. 3 flags,\nup to the start of Ch. 4.
005	Turn ON the Prologue to Ch. 4 flags, \nup to the start of Ch. 5.
006	Turn ON the Prologue to Ch. 5 flags,\nup to the start of Ch. 6.
007	Turn all flags OFF.
008	Flag management complete.

MSG_GUIDE_BSC_ITEM03_INFO_MAIN	Performa are basically obtained from battles.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0When you defeat enemies or pull off Sessions\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\nyou will acquire the Performa those enemies\nhave. Also, you may gain Performa from your\naudiences in battles.\n\nThere may be another way of gaining Performa\nbesides battles as well. Keep an eye out as\nyou progress...
MSG_GUIDE_BSC_ITEM04_PRE	Okay, so hints on Performa are...
MSG_GUIDE_BSC_ITEM04_INFO_TITLE	Hints on Performa
MSG_GUIDE_BSC_ITEM04_INFO_MAIN	In the Unity screen, you can check details\non the Performa needed to perform that\nUnity.\n\nHints for obtaining them, mainly \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0locations\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffand \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0enemies that have them\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, will be\ndisplayed. Make good use of this when\nsearching for Performa.
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM01_PRE	Okay, so Carnage Unity is...
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM01_INFO_TITLE	Carnage Unity
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM01_INFO_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Carnage Unity\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff is the ritual where \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mirages\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffand \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Performa obtained from enemies \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffare\nfused to change them into new Carnage.\n\nBy performing Carnage Unity, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you will\nacquire a more powerful Carnage and be\nable to learn new skills from it\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThis is a crucial element for playing\nthrough this game, so actively make\nuse of it!
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM02_PRE	Okay, so Carnage are...
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM02_INFO_TITLE	Carnage
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM02_INFO_MAIN	When a Mirage transforms into a weapon,\nit is called a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Carnage\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe abilities of Carnage are based on\nthree elements: \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Attack\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Resistance\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Skills\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThose abilities differ depending on the\nCarnage, so try using different ones\ndepending on the situation.
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM03_PRE	Okay, so about learning skills...
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM03_INFO_TITLE	Learning skills
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM03_INFO_MAIN	To learn skills from a Carnage, you need\nto continually use it. How much you've\nused it is called \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mastery\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe Mastery gauge fills at the end of\nevery battle, and how much it fills depends\nupon your actions during it.\n\nEvery magic or physical action taken in\nbattle counts toward that fight's Mastery\nbonus, and at the end of battle, your\ncumulative actions are added up into a\nsingle bonus to your Mastery gauge. Once\nit reaches a certain amount, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you will be\nable to learn a new skill\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM04_PRE	Okay, so about powering up skills...
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM04_INFO_TITLE	Powering up skills
MSG_GUIDE_CRN_ITEM04_INFO_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0If you learn a skill that you already have,\nthat skill will power up. \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffFor example, if you\nalready have "Zio" and you learn another\n"Zio," it will power up to "\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Zio +1\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff."\n\nWhen a skill powers up, there are plenty\nof benefits, such as \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0an increase in effect\nand decrease in EP cost\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. However,\nsome skills, such as passive skills that\nchange the compatibility of affinities, will\nnot power up.
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM01_PRE	Okay, so about strengthening Carnage...
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM01_INFO_TITLE	Strengthening Carnage
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM01_INFO_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0A Carnage that has already completed its\nskill inheritance \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffcan be further strengthened\nwith Carnage Unity.\n\nBy strengthening a Carnage, not only do you\nincrease its Attack, but you can re-learn\nskills and a new skill on top of them can\nbe learned.\n\nJust like performing normal Carnage\nUnity, select the Carnage you wish to\nstrengthen and then perform Unity on\nit.
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM02_PRE	Okay, so to strengthen Carnage...
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM02_INFO_TITLE	How to strengthen Carnage
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM02_INFO_MAIN	A Carnage where all skill inheritance has\nbeen completed will have a "+" (plus sign)\nat the end of its name.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0When you select a Carnage with a "+" and\nperform Unity, you will be able to\nstrengthen the existing Carnage.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffIf you wish instead to create a brand new\nCarnage through the normal process, then\nchoose one that does not have a "+" on it.
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM03_PRE	Okay, Carnage strengthening bonuses are...
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM03_INFO_TITLE	Carnage strengthening bonuses
MSG_GUIDE_ENF_ITEM03_INFO_MAIN	When you are about to strengthen a Carnage,\nsometimes the Carnage will shine. This is a\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0bonus chance to strengthen Carnage\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and you\nwill be able to increase its Attack even more.\n\nIn order to gain this bonus, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you will need to\nuse more Performa than normal\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. If you wish\nto not use the extra Performa, you can pass\non the bonus and perform a normal Unity.
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM01_PRE	Okay, so Radiant Unity is...
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM01_INFO_TITLE	Radiant Unity
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM01_INFO_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Radiant Unity\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff is a ritual in which Performa\nand the entertainment power of artists are\nfused to create \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Radiant Skills\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nRadiant Unity requires special Performa\nborn from each of the cast.
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM02_PRE	Okay, so Radiant Skills are...
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM02_INFO_TITLE	Radiant Skills
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM02_INFO_MAIN	Radiant Skills are different from normal skills\nand are \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0exceptionally useful since they use\nno Skill Slots and are effective by simply\nbeing equipped\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nSome skills are necessary for story\nprogression, so make good use of them!
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM03_PRE	Okay, so about Stage Ranks...
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM03_INFO_TITLE	Stage Rank
MSG_GUIDE_RAD_ITEM03_INFO_MAIN	Stage Rank indicates the cast member's\nrank as an entertainer.\n\nOne's Stage Rank will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0increase the more\nhe or she participates in combat, including\nperforming longer Session chains\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nWhen the Stage Rank increases, a new\nPerforma will be born from within the\ncast member and become the material\nfor a new Radiant Skill.
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM01_PRE	Okay, so Class Change is...
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM01_INFO_TITLE	Class Change
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM01_INFO_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Class Change\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff is a ritual for Chrom and the\nother Mirages to be reborn into more\npowerful \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0advanced classes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nBy performing Class Change, the Mirage\nwill be able to transform into Carnage\nspecifically for that advanced class.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0A Master Seal needs to be used to\nperform this Class Change.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM02_PRE	Okay, so about how to obtain Master Seals...
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM02_INFO_TITLE	How to obtain Master Seals
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM02_INFO_MAIN	Master Seals are rare Performa. Sometimes\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0powerful enemies that appear in the story\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffwill have them, or you may find them hidden\nin \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0treasure boxes within the dungeons\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nYour opportunities to obtain them are limited,\nso make sure you consider your options\ncarefully before committing to a class\nchange.
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM03_PRE	Okay, so about the types of advanced\nclasses...
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM03_INFO_TITLE	Types of advanced classes
MSG_GUIDE_CLS_ITEM03_INFO_MAIN	Each Mirage has \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0two types of advanced\nclass they can change into\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. They each\nhave their own strengths and weaknesses\nin their statistics, and your choice may\ngreatly change your progress through battles.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Once a Mirage class changes, it is possible\nfor it to change into the other advanced\nclass as well\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. You will be able to create even\nmore different Carnage, but be mindful of the\nnumber of Master Seals you have.

MSG_RECORD_TTL_TITLE	Play Records & Awards

Map\MapTutorial.msbt
T_AUTOMAP_TITLE	Making the Most of the Map
T_AUTOMAP	The \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0minimap \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffin the bottom-left of the screen will\nshow your surroundings as you move around.\n\nAlso, if you open the Topic screen with \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x04\0, then\nuse \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0d\0/\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0e\0 to select "\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0MAP\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff", you can check the\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0full-size map\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, which shows everywhere you've\nbeen to so far.\n\nUsing the minimap and the full-size map will raise\nyour chances of surviving any perilous dungeon.
T_ATTACK_TITLE	Enemy Symbols and Sword Attacks
T_ATTACK_00	\x0e\x04\0# \0MAP_ENEMY_APPEARANCE_1003_mr1051\0Wait, Itsuki.
T_ATTACK_01	(There's an enemy here too...!)
T_ATTACK_02	The \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0symbol\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff you see before you represents\nthe presence of an enemy Mirage.\nWhen you come into contact with\nthis symbol, a battle will begin.\n\nYou can perform a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0sword attack\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff with \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x05\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff on\nthese symbols to knock down enemies and\navoid combat. In addition, when you come into\ncontact with a downed Enemy Symbol, you may\nbe able to take the first action in the battle.\n\nIn these situations, it is highly\nrecommended that you rely on your\nsword attack.
T_WALL_TITLE	Obstacles and Sword Attacks
T_WALL_00	At times there will be a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0wall\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, like this one,\nblocking your way inside a dungeon.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0By attacking the exposed core in \nthe center of the wall with your sword,\nyou can destroy that wall. \n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffNote that a wall can only be destroyed \nfrom the side where the core is exposed.\nIn addition, some walls can only be \ndestroyed by special means.
T_CAMERA_TITLE	Camera Controls
T_CAMERA_00	The following camera controls can be\nadjusted inside a dungeon:\n-\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0c\0 or \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0d\0 and \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0e\0 will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0move\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff the camera.\n-\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x11\0 or \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x08\0 will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0reset the camera forward\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n-\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x10\0 + \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x0c\0 will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0change the camera's distance\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nIn addition, the direction the camera \nrotates can be changed in Settings in\nthe main menu.
T_WILD_TITLE	Savage Enemies
T_WILD_00	\x0e\x04\0\x18\x15\0EVT_REPLY_0009_mr1051\0What is this presence...?
T_WILD_01	(What in the world...!?\nThis one's different from the others...!)
T_WILD_02	You will encounter special \nEnemy Symbols.\n\nThe black Enemy Symbol before you \nis called a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Savage Enemy\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. Your sword\nattack will not work on it, and it will be \nquite difficult to defeat.\n\nYou will only encounter these symbols\noccasionally, but they are \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0dangerous entities\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\nIf you do come into contact with one,\nit is best to try to \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0escape\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff or deal with\nthem using a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Special Performance\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
T_PORTAL_00	(What is this...?)
T_PORTAL_TITLE	Warp Portals
T_PORTAL_01	Devices called \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Warp Portals \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffwill appear \nwithin a dungeon.\n\nActivating multiple Warp Portals\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0will enable you to teleport to different\nlocations\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. Note, however, that you \ncannot teleport to Warp Portals located\nin other dungeons.\n\nWarp Portals will aid you in completing\na dungeon, so it is best to activate them\nwhenever you find them.
T_PORTAL_02	(Nothing's happening...\nI should continue on, for now.)
T_PORTAL_BTUP_00	(This...)
T_PORTAL_BTUP_01	(I feel like I've seen something \nlike this before.)
T_PORTAL_BTUP_02	(It looks like some kind of machine.)
T_PORTAL_BTUP_TITLE	Activating Portals
T_PORTAL_BTUP_03	Unactivated Portals can be found \nthroughout a dungeon. Closely inspecting\na Portal will activate it, enabling you to \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0teleport\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff to other Portals. \n\nNote, however, that you cannot \nteleport to Portals located \nin other dungeons.\n\nWarp Portals will aid you in completing\na dungeon, so it is best to activate them\nwhenever you find them.
T_PORTAL_BTUP_04	(I should check it out...)
T_LARGMAP_TITLE	Tokyo Access Map
T_LARGMAP_00	Selecting a location on the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tokyo Access\nMap \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffwill enable you to travel to that location.\n\nIn addition to pressing \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0 at specific\nareas on the edges of the field, you can\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0press\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x05\0 to open the Tokyo Access Map,\nas long as you are outdoors in a city\nlike Shibuya\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
T_LOCKTBOX_TITLE	Special Treasure Boxes
T_LOCKTBOX_00	Some treasure boxes found in a dungeon\nwill not open normally.\n\nSpecial treasure boxes can only be\nunlocked by using a \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\0\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n(If you are unable to obtain\nthe contents of a special treasure box,\nthe \x0e\x02\0\x02\0\0 will not be used.)
FACILITY_TUTORIAL_TITLE	Shibuya
FACILITY_TUTORIAL_MAIN	Various facilities are located in Shibuya.\n\nNumerous \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0items\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff can be purchased at \nthe convenience store \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Hee Ho Mart\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Accessories\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff that act as armor for Itsuki's\nallies can be bought at \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Jewelry Carabia\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nOther elements can be found there as \nwell, so be sure to fully explore Shibuya.
T_BLOCKWALL_TITLE	Special Walls
T_BLOCKWALL_00	There are special walls that will inhibit \nyour advancement through a dungeon.\n\nItsuki currently cannot destroy this type \nof wall, but he may find a means to do so\nif the story is progressed.
T_REQUEST_TITLE_1	Requests
T_REQUEST_MAIN_1	While you are in the city or investigating\na dungeon, you may discover characters \nwith a yellow \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Request Icon \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffabove their\nheads. You can take on \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0requests\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff by\nspeaking with them.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0You will be rewarded for completing \nrequests from these characters\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. There are\nno deadlines for requests and they can be \nstarted at any time, so be sure to accept \nthem when you have time between \ninvestigations.
T_REQUEST_TITLE_2	Proceeding with a Request
T_REQUEST_MAIN_2	Requests that have been accepted \nand are \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0currently under way \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffwill be\ndisplayed as green icons.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0When the conditions of the request \nhave been fulfilled\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, the icon will turn \n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0purple\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. Speaking to the character in this \ncondition will complete the request.\n\nThe current state of requests can be\nchecked from the map as well.
T_RECOVERY_TITLE	Healing HP and EP
T_RECOVERY_00	HP and EP can be healed with items \nor skills, as well as by using \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0facilities \nlocated in the city \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffsuch as the cafe \nand vending machines.\n\nIf you feel that the investigation of \na dungeon has become too much, \nit is best to not push yourself any further \nand return to the city.
T_ARENA_TITLE	Illusory Urahara
T_ARENA_MAIN	There is an \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0arena\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff located in \nIllusory Urahara where you can \npartake in exciting battles against \nskilled Mirages.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Participating in the arena costs money, \nbut you will be rewarded if you emerge\nvictorious from multiple battles.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n\nHowever, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0if your party is defeated \nit will be game over, as it would in \na normal battle\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, so please be cautious.
T_DREAMTREASURE_00	(This box looks a bit weird...\nIt's like it's protected by some power.)
T_DREAMTREASURE_TITLE	Opening Protected Boxes
T_DREAMTREASURE	Some of the treasure boxes in this Idolasphere\nare protected by a mysterious power, and require\na \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0particular experience \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffto open.\n\nMake enough progress in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0side stories \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffof the\ncast member this box is responding to, and by\nexperiencing the consequences of their artistic\nambitions, you will become able to open the box.
T_TOKYOMILLENNIUM_TITLE	Tokyo Millennium Collection
T_TOKYOMILLENNIUM	The costume you just acquired is a special\noutfit prepared for the fashion show called the\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tokyo Millennium Collection \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffin which \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tsubasa\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Kiria\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Eleonora \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffall took part.\n\nYou can look back on the show by checking the\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0magazine rack\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Fortuna Office\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. Be sure to\ntake a look next time you're there!
T_IMPROMPTUSESSION_TITLE	Jump-in Session Skills
T_IMPROMPTUSESSION	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Jump-in Session Skills \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffare a kind of \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Session Skill\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\nunique to those \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0cast members who don't normally\nparticipate in battles\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and which let the characters\nwho have them join in during Sessions in battle.\n\nThe conditions for participating in a Session are\nthe same as usual. This is a way to make your\nmid-battle performances even more rich and\nriveting!

Tutorial_Title	Eateries & Vending Machines
Tutorial_Text	Food and drinks from shops and vending\nmachines will \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0fully restore all HP & EP\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffand \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0cure all status ailments, including\nUnconscious\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nIn addition, when cast members consume\na food or drink item that they enjoy, it\ntemporarily raises their \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Luck\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff stat.\n\nNote: A cast member cannot have multiple\nLuck boosts from food or drink active at the\nsame time.

SPEC_A_2	(Crisp, elegant, mature... A flavor-forward\ndelight that assuages both body and soul,\nwith a rewardingly dry finish.)
SPEC_B_2	(Authentically heat-aged, with a sharpness\nthat lingers quite playfully on the palate so\nas not to offend the senses.)
NAME_3	Citricana Juice
SPEC_A_3	(An unmistakable fruity aroma transports\none to a tropical tableau. Simply smashing!)
SPEC_B_3	(A bold fusion of smooth and refreshing,\nits sweetness is the height of decadence...\nas sublime as it is hypnotic.)
NAME_4	Amrita Shower
SPEC_A_4	(A welcome surprise of avocado perfectly\naccompanies its bubbly finish. The keen\npalate may even detect a hint of anise.)
SPEC_B_4	(The grape version of this crowd favorite is\na tribute to simplicity itself. A 10 out of 10!)
NAME_5	Veggie Juice EX
SPEC_A_5	(Seven days' worth of nutrients fortify this\ncharming melange of savory undertones.\nTruly, a lively and robust thrill ride!)
SPEC_B_5	(Flavors shift gracefully in lush Protean\ndelight so as to titillate every last anxious\ntaste bud. Good show indeed!)
NAME_6	Strawberry Mochi Drink
SPEC_A_6	(Pleasant from start to finish, with satisfying\nhigh notes of strawberry and mochi. One\nstruggles to set it down between sips!)
SPEC_B_6	(The nuances are almost nostalgic in their\nnot-so-subtle flavor profile: an inviting\neruption of strawberry.)
NAME_7	Pumpkin Spice Soup
SPEC_A_7	(A sweet, earthy fusion that grips you the\nmoment it touches the lips and generously\nrefuses to let go. How sensational!)
SPEC_B_7	(The tantalizing creaminess adds a depth\nthat is as dulcifying as it is velvety.)
NAME_8	Muscle Drink EX
SPEC_A_8	(Rarely is a utilitarian offering so invitingly\nmarried to such a complex tone as this.)
SPEC_B_8	(One cannot help but sweat with each\ncaptivating sip. Savor responsibly!)
NAME_9	Hi-Fiber Vortex
SPEC_A_9	(Its almost-mineral quality makes good on\nthe slogan's famed fiber-filled promise.)
SPEC_B_9	(Never in the history of history itself has two\nhours' worth of fiber tasted so exquisite.)
NAME_10	Macho Mocha
SPEC_A_10	(Its delicate, full-bodied profile invariably\nreassures the drinker of their manly nature.\nBest paired with retracted pinky finger.)
SPEC_B_10	(Justly celebrated for its nearly low-sugar\nlevels, this is a true testament to virility.\nSurely, not your ordinary bruncheon fare!) 
NAME_11	Beauty Bomb
SPEC_A_11	(One's skin instantly feels refreshed,\nradiant even. A veritable fountain of youth\nwithin each and every bottle!)
SPEC_B_11	(The label's promise of increased blood\ncirculation is laid bare, as words pale to\ndescribe such a transcendental warmth!)

SPEC_A_12	(A triumvirate of cheeses melt impeccably\nin one's mouth in truly regal fashion.)
SPEC_B_12	(The bouquet of sour-sweet berries is aptly\nenriched by mellow overtones throughout.)

SPEC_A_13	(The faint bitterness of the caramel ties\nthis masterpiece together quite opulently.)
SPEC_B_13	(Whipped cream sends one on a hedonistic\nadventure from which there is no return:\nthis creation hits the proverbial "spot"!)
NAME_14	Cinnamon-Sugar Crepe
SPEC_A_14	(Bitter ice cream deftly equalizes the\nwanton extravagance of each chewy\nmorsel. Magnificent to the last bite!)
SPEC_B_14	(An herbal—some might say "flamboyant"—\naftertaste begs one's return bite after bite,\na rustic treat for the wayward palate.)
NAME_15	Biovitahydroxy Crepe
SPEC_A_15	(The flavor profile is dominated by what\ncan only be labeled culinary anarchy:\nat once spicy yet adroitly saccharine.)
SPEC_B_15	(Despite its austere tone, it imposes an\nembargo on the woes of modern life. One\neasily forgives the digestive ills to come.)
NAME_16	Burnt Miso-Squid Crepe

SPEC_B_16	(A nearly floral aroma of squid begs one's\nregard, inviting in a Trojan horse of regret...)
NAME_17	Demi-Naan Burger

SPEC_B_17	(Elegant meat juices and a silky demi-glace\ncombine to weep puddles of pure glee.)

SPEC_A_18	(Those crosshatched grill marks testify\nthat this virtuoso treat reigns supreme\nin the realm of handheld delicacies!)
SPEC_B_18	(A simply divine slab of protein, rightfully\npraised by student and noble alike.)

TUTORIAL_FIRST_TITLE	Skill Inheritance
TUTORIAL_FIRST	Your weapon (or "Carnage") has reached\na certain \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mastery level\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nYou will gain Mastery each time you act\nin combat, and when you have enough,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0you can learn a new skill\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nTry checking the new skills that you just\nlearned.
TUTORIAL_ADD_TITLE	Selecting Skill Slots
TUTORIAL_ADD	The cursor has moved to the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0left\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, to the\nskills you currently have learned.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Highlight a slot for the new skill you\nwould like to learn \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffand press \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0.\n\nIf you need to review the new skill, you\ncan go back by pressing \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x08\0.
TUTORIAL_SWAP_TITLE	Keeping Skills
TUTORIAL_SWAP	As you draw more skills out of Carnage,\nyou will run out of open slots and must\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0select which skill to keep\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nHighlight a skill and press \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0 to\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0replace it with the new skill.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\nIf you do not wish to give up any of your\nexisting skills, then press \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x05\0, and you\ncan opt to \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0not learn\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff the new skill.
TUTORIAL_LVUP_TITLE	Powering Up Skills
TUTORIAL_LVUP	If you \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0learn a skill you already learned\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\nthen you can make that skill become\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0stronger\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThe sequence here is much the same.\nFirst, press \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0, and the cursor will\njump to the correct skill automatically.\nThen, press \x0e\x03\0\x04\0\0\x07\0 to power it up.\n\nNote: Some skills do not power up.
TUTORIAL_SESSION_UP_TITLE	Low-Level Sessions Skills
TUTORIAL_SESSION_UP	You learned a new Session skill, known as\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\0\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. However, it is weaker\nthan a Session skill you already learned:\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\x01\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nIn this situation, you will automatically\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0give up \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffthis new Session skill, in order to\nmake sure you do not accidentally\noverwrite the more powerful skill!
TUTORIAL_SESSION_UP_GET_TITLE	Powering Up Session Skills
TUTORIAL_SESSION_UP_GET	You learned a new Session skill, known as\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\0\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and it is stronger\nthan a Session skill you have already\nlearned: \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\x01\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nIn this situation, you will automatically\noverwrite the existing one and thereby\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0strengthen your Session skill\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
TUTORIAL_CARNAGE_MASTER_TITLE	Try Other Carnage
TUTORIAL_CARNAGE_MASTER	If you have inherited all the skills available\nfrom a Carnage, then there are no more\nskills to learn from using it.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0If you have the opportunity to create new\nCarnage through Unity, it's recommended\nthat you return to the Bloom Palace and\ncraft your new weapon rather than persist\nwith one you've already mastered.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\nNote: Be mindful of a Carnage's affinities.\nDo not select a weapon that will put you at\na disadvantage in your current area...
TUTORIAL_SP_ATTACK_TITLE	Bane Skills
TUTORIAL_SP_ATTACK	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Bane Skills \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffactivate a Session against\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0specific classes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, such as Dragon or\nHorseback, regardless of affinities.\n\nFor example, Horseslayer will always\ntrigger a Session as long as the enemy\nis a Horseback Mirage.\n\nNote that Bane Skills also have a normal \nweapon affinity.

Sidestory\ss_flag_return.msbt
001	Another side story is currently active.\nWould you like to begin a different one?\n(You may restart the other story later.)
002	Cancel Tsubasa's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
003	Cancel Touma's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
004	Cancel Maiko's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
005	Cancel Barry's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
006	Cancel Eleonora's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
007	Cancel Mamori's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
008	Cancel Yashiro's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
009	Cancel Kiria's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
010	Cancel Tiki's side story, in progress?\n(You may start it again from the beginning.)
011	The side story has been accepted.
TUTORIAL_TITLE	Canceling a Side Story
TUTORIAL_MAIN	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0One side story can be active at a time.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\nIf you wish to start a new one, then the\ncurrent one must be \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0canceled\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. You may\naccept canceled side stories again as\nmuch as needed, but you will always\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0start them over from the beginning\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nWhen you cancel one, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0all key items\nand Performa acquired in it will be lost\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.

SwitchEvent\sw_BonusElement.msbt
001	Changing the Main Cast in the Second Playthrough
002	As a special feature of your second playthrough,\nyou can now \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0remove Itsuki from the main cast\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\nThis gives you complete freedom to play with\nexactly the cast you want.\n\nBear in mind, when Itsuki is not in the main cast,\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0commands given using TACTICS will not work\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\nHowever, the contents of your orders will be\nsaved, and will go back into effect once Itsuki\nrejoins the main cast.
003	(But, I'm still a Lord... I can't afford to slack\noff, even if I'm off the team.)

SwitchEvent\SW_NewDungeon.msbt
001	Special Training for Itsuki and Co.
002	Starting right now, you'll be able to access\na special Idolasphere from the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Bloom Palace\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\none dedicated to giving \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Itsuki and his friends\na special opportunity to train\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nThis training Idolasphere will be useful for making\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Itsuki's party grow in various ways\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. If you ever\nfind yourself thinking, "the enemies are too hard!,"\nor "there's no time to train!," try and give it a go.
003	Special Training: Mirage Hunter
004	In the "\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mirage Hunter\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff" special training, Itsuki and\nhis friends can hunt down enemies to earn \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0items\nwhich are useful for growing stronger\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n                      ◇◆◇◆◇◆◇\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tomes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Consumable items that grant Exp.\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Skill Books\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Consumable items that grant weapon Mastery\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Detritus\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Key items to be traded in for stat-raising ones
005	Types of Special Training
006	There are \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0three types\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff of special training, and\neach takes place in its own dedicated space, so\nbe sure to choose the one that suits your needs.\n                      ◇◆◇◆◇◆◇\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0EXPeditious Hunter\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Earn Tomes in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Training Area\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Masterful Hunter\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Earn Skill Books in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Mastery Area\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Savage Hunter\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n  Earn Detritus in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Prisoner Area\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff
007	EX Story
008	The \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0EX (Extra) story \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffis split into small chapters\nthat take place alongside the game's main and\nside stories. In addition to showing new scenes\nfrom the protagonists' lives and careers, they\nalso allow you to obtain \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0new skills and costumes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\nso you should pursue them whenever you get\na chance.\n\nTo begin the EX story, speak with \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tiki \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffat the\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Bloom Palace\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
009	The Area of Aspiration
010	You can now travel to the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Area of Aspiration\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffthrough a gate inside the Bloom Palace.\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Making your way through the Idolasphere there\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffis how you'll \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0progress through the EX story\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nFurthermore, in addition to regular items, the\ntreasure boxes inside the Idolasphere can contain\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0skills and costumes\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, so be sure to seek them out.
011	Continuing the EX Story
012	The EX story consists of a number of chapters.\nTo begin each one, you will first have to\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0meet certain conditions by progressing through\nthe main and/or side stories\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n\nYou can find out the conditions you have to meet\nat any given time by checking the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0laptop \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffstanding\non a desk in the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Fortuna Office\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
013	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x01\0The door appears to be sealed by a\nmysterious power...\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff
014	\x0e\0\x03\x02\x01\0The door is sealed by a mysterious power...\nYou have to complete more side stories to\nproceed past this point.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff
015	Notes on Undergoing Special Training
016	When undergoing special training, please\nbear in mind the following points:\n                      ◇◆◇◆◇◆◇\n- You \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0can't save \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffthe game during special training.\n- If you lose a battle it's \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Game Over\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n- You can undergo each training \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0as many times\n  as you want\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\n- \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Training up \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffItsuki's party \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0too much \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffmay reduce\n  your enjoyment of the battle system.

MSG_DFCLSEL_INTRO_01_TITLE	Game Difficulty
MSG_DFCLSEL_INTRO_01_MAIN	First, select a game difficulty.\n\nThis setting adjusts the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0difficulty of\nbattles\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. It \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0does not affect the story\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff,\nso please select what fits your needs.\n\nThis difficulty can be changed at any\ntime from the game's main menu in\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Settings\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
MSG_DFCLSEL_ASK	Start the game with which difficulty?
DFCLSEL_MENU_ITEM_VERY_EASY	Friendly
DFCLSEL_MENU_ITEM_EASY	Easy
DFCLSEL_MENU_ITEM_NORMAL	Normal
DFCLSEL_MENU_ITEM_HARD	Hard
DFCLSEL_MENU_ITEM_LUNATIC	Lunatic
DFCLSEL_MENU_HELP_VERY_EASY	A very-easy difficulty in which anyone\ncan finish the game. Recommended\nfor those who want to enjoy the story.
DFCLSEL_MENU_HELP_EASY	This difficulty is easier than Normal.\nRecommended for those who want to\ncasually enjoy the game.
DFCLSEL_MENU_HELP_NORMAL	This is the standard difficulty.\nRecommended for those who are \nplaying the game for the first time.
DFCLSEL_MENU_HELP_HARD	This difficulty is more challenging\nthan Normal. Recommended for those who\nare confident in playing RPGs.
DFCLSEL_MENU_HELP_LUNATIC	An insane difficulty. Vicious battles\nfraught with hardship await those who\nchoose to walk this path.
MSG_DFCLSEL_CONFIRM	Begin the game with the \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0\x0e\x02\0\x02\0\0\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\ndifficulty setting?
MSG_DFCLSEL_LUNA_WARNING_TITLE_01	Caution for Lunatic Difficulty
MSG_DFCLSEL_LUNA_WARNING_MAIN_01	Once a game is begun on Lunatic\ndifficulty, it \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0cannot be changed \nafterward\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff. If you want to change this\ndifficulty, you will have to restart the\ngame from the very beginning.
MSG_DFCLSEL_LUNA_WARNING_TITLE_02	Data Carried Over for Lunatic Difficulty 
MSG_DFCLSEL_LUNA_WARNING_MAIN_02	The following are carried over when a\ngame is begun on Lunatic difficulty:\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0◆Play Records and Awards\n◆Items Available for Sale\n◆Costumes and Artwork\n◆Analysis Information\n◆Urahara Arena Titles\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff\n\nPlease note that \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0other things such as\nmoney and levels will not carry over\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.
MSG_DFCLSEL_LUNA_CONFIRM	Are you sure you want to challenge\nthe Lunatic difficulty?

SYS_CMN_BACKUP_SKILL_TTL_MAIN	The cast that do not participate in\nbattle support Itsuki and friends in\nthe background with \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Backup Skills\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.\nThese abilities affect the game's\ngeneral mechanics, such as the prices\nat which items are bought or sold.\n\nYou can obtain \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Maiko's\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Tiki's\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff, and\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0Barry's \x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xffBackup Skills by \x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0completing\ntheir respective side stories\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff.

SYS_CMN_BACKUP_SKILL_EXPL_MAIKO_01	The industry connections that Maiko\nhas fostered over drinks can now be\nused.\n\n\x0e\0\x03\x02\x02\0From now on, you will get more\nmoney when selling items to stores.\x0e\0\x03\x02\xff\xff

TITLE	Reincarnation
OUTLINE0	Itsuki Aoi, a high-school student, is invited by\nhis friend Touma Akagi to visit Daitama\nObservatory, the event space of a TV station\nby the seaside.\n\nHowever, the meeting time comes and goes.\nTouma is nowhere to be seen and instead\nsends a message saying he's running late.\n\nAs Itsuki wanders around to kill some time,\nhe eventually runs into...
OUTLINE1	Itsuki Aoi, a high-school student, is invited by\nhis friend Touma Akagi to visit Daitama\nObservatory, the event space of a TV station\nby the seaside.\n\nHowever, the meeting time comes and goes.\nTouma is nowhere to be seen and instead\nsends a message saying he's running late.\n\nAs Itsuki wanders around to kill some time,\nhe eventually runs into his childhood friend\nTsubasa Oribe.\n\nTsubasa is there to participate in an amateur\nidol competition, but the event is attacked\nby mysterious beings called Mirages.\n\nThe situation seems dire, but Itsuki resolves\nto save his friend. Faced with mortal peril,\nItsuki awakens to a mysterious power and\nmanages to save Tsubasa... as she also\nunlocks the same strange powers within\nherself.\n\nEventually, their friend Touma arrives on\nthe scene, and the united trio manages to\ndefeat the Mirages in their way.
OUTLINE2	Itsuki Aoi, a high-school student, is invited by\nhis friend Touma Akagi to visit Daitama\nObservatory, the event space of a TV station\nby the seaside.\n\nHowever, the meeting time comes and goes.\nTouma is nowhere to be seen and instead\nsends a message saying he's running late.\n\nAs Itsuki wanders around to kill some time,\nhe eventually runs into his childhood friend\nTsubasa Oribe.\nTsubasa is there to participate in an amateur\nidol competition in secret.\n\nHowever, spectral figures suddenly storm\nthe stage and kidnap Tsubasa through an\nominous portal.\n\nThe situation seems dire, but Itsuki resolves\nto save his friend.
OUTLINE3	Itsuki Aoi goes to save Tsubasa Oribe, his\nchildhood friend who was kidnapped through\nan ethereal portal, and is faced with mortal\nperil. However, after awakening to a mysterious\npower, he and Tsubasa manage to drive back\ntheir attackers.\n\nBut the danger is far from over.\n\nThe mysterious beings, Chrom and Caeda, are\nable to regain their senses with the help of\nItsuki's power. With their help, Itsuki and\nTsubasa continue onward through this dark\nmaze in search of an exit.
OUTLINE4	The mysterious beings, Chrom and Caeda, are\nable to regain their senses with the help of\nItsuki's power. With their help, Itsuki and\nTsubasa continue onward through this dark\nmaze in search of an exit.\n\nSuddenly, the leader of the monsters appears\nto stand in their way—the MC, Gojuin. However,\nat that moment, a friendly face comes to their\naid: Itsuki's friend, Touma Akagi.

TOPIC\TopicMain01.msbt
TITLE	A Star is Born
OUTLINE0	Itsuki and Tsubasa are suddenly faced with\nthe new world of the entertainment business.\nTheir fate seems to hold new and strange\nencounters—and the mysteries of the\n"performing arts."\n\nWhat exactly are these beings called\n"Mirages"? And will Itsuki be able to find\nAyaha Oribe? It seems these answers lie\nat the heart of Japan's entertainment\nindustry...
OUTLINE1	Itsuki and Tsubasa are suddenly faced with\nthe new world of the entertainment business.\nTheir fate seems to hold new and strange\nencounters—and the mysteries of the\n"performing arts."\n\nCrushed by her instructor's harsh critique\nduring her very first lesson at Uzume\nLesson Studio, Tsubasa is demoralized.\nHowever, after seeing Kiria's performance,\nshe resolves to become an idol no matter what.\n\nImmediately after, SIV-LIVE is attacked\nby a Mirage that has possessed Ayaha,\nTsubasa's long-lost sister. After\nsearching for her for all these years,\nTsubasa is determined to save her\nand puts all her emotion into her song.\n\nThrough her singing, Tsubasa foils the\nMirage's plan. By saving her sister\nwith her own strength, Tsubasa is able\nto finally escape the shadows of her\npast and turn to her future.\nAnd now, her debut draws closer...
OUTLINE2	Itsuki and Tsubasa are suddenly faced with\nthe new world of the entertainment business.\nTheir fate seems to hold new and strange\nencounters—and the mysteries of the\n"performing arts."\n\nWhat exactly are these beings called\n"Mirages"? And will Itsuki be able to find\nAyaha Oribe? It seems these answers lie\nat the heart of Japan's entertainment\nindustry...\n\nIn order to prepare Tsubasa for her debut,\nher training now begins. Itsuki, who was\ntold to accompany her, heads to the\nUzume Lesson Studio in Shibuya for\nher lessons.
OUTLINE3	Itsuki and Tsubasa are still in shock\nfrom suddenly finding themselves in the\nentertainment business. Their fate seems\nto hold new and strange encounters, and\nthe mysteries of the "performing arts."\n\nCrushed by her instructor's harsh critique\nduring her very first lesson at Uzume\nLesson Studio, Tsubasa is demoralized.\n\nHaving seen this, however, the famed\nKiria Kurono personally gives Itsuki\ntickets for a joint concert called\nSIV-LIVE. What awaits them at the\nconcert venue in Shibuya?
OUTLINE4	After seeing Kiria's performance at the\njoint concert SIV-LIVE, Tsubasa's\nresolve to become an idol is renewed.\n\nSuddenly, however, a swarm of Mirages\nattacks the venue. The one leading the\nassault is none other than Tsubasa's\nmissing sister, Ayaha...\n\nKiria is injured trying to protect Tsubasa,\nand she orders Itsuki and the others\nto chase after Ayaha, who has\ndisappeared into Illusory 106.
OUTLINE5	The one leading the Mirage assault is\nnone other than Tsubasa's missing\nsister, Ayaha...\n\nAlthough the group manages to corner\nAyaha within Illusory 106,\nTsubasa's words are unable to\nreach Ayaha.\n\nTsubasa needs a song that can reach\nher sister's heart—and in order to do so,\nTsubasa must first perform Unity\nusing the Performa she has just obtained.
OUTLINE6	The one leading the Mirage assault is\nnone other than Tsubasa's missing\nsister, Ayaha...\n\nAlthough the group manages to corner\nAyaha within Illusory 106, Tsubasa's\nwords are unable to reach Ayaha.\n\nTsubasa needs a song that can reach\nher sister's heart—and after performing\nUnity with the newly obtained Performa,\nshe acquires "Feel My Voice."\n\nItsuki hurries to Illusory 106 so that\nTsubasa can face her sister once again.

TOPIC\TopicMain02.msbt
TITLE	Head Over Heels for Her
OUTLINE0	After Ayaha is rescued from the clutches of the\nMirages, a spectacular debut as an idol awaits\nTsubasa. Her name is all over magazines, and\nshe begins her slow rise to stardom.\n\nAnd in order to market her even more, Maiko's\nnext plan for her is...
OUTLINE1	After Ayaha is rescued from the clutches of the\nMirages, a spectacular debut as an idol awaits\nTsubasa. Her name is all over magazines, and\nshe begins her slow rise to stardom.\n\nAnd in order to market her even more, Maiko's\nnext plan for her is... a modeling job!\n\nThe photographer for the photo shoot is the\nacclaimed Nobu Horinozawa. However, his\nheart is being manipulated by a Mirage...\n\nHorinozawa kidnaps Maiko so that she can\nonce again model for him, but Tsubasa is\nable to show her resolution as a model—and\nher irresistible pose for the camera!\n\nAfter successfully defeating the Mirage...\nTsubasa has a photo shoot in Shibuya,\nwinning hearts with shot after shot.
OUTLINE2	After Ayaha is rescued from the clutches of the\nMirages, a spectacular debut as an idol awaits\nTsubasa. Her name is all over magazines, and\nshe begins her slow rise to stardom.\n\nAnd in order to market her even more, Maiko's\nnext plan for her is... a modeling job! TITLE	True Colors
OUTLINE0	Due to the shock from getting back part of\nher Dragonstone, Tiki falls into a deep sleep.\nHowever, time marches on.\n\nAll of Tokyo eagerly awaits Daiba TV's event\nfor their 50th anniversary: Enter-Kingdom.\n\nThe grandest festival for the performing arts\nyet is about to begin.
OUTLINE1	Due to the shock from getting back part of\nher Dragonstone, Tiki falls into a deep sleep.\nHowever, time marches on.\n\nAll of Tokyo eagerly awaits Daiba TV's event\nfor their 50th anniversary: Enter-Kingdom.\n\nTiki awakens from her deep sleep with a\nportion of her memories back. She explains\nto Itsuki the plans of the mysterious figure\n"Gharnef" and his unseen hand in the grand\nEnter-Kingdom. His goal is to resurrect a terrible\nmonster known as the "Shadow Dragon"\nand bring destruction to the world.\n\nYatsufusa Hatanaka reveals his true cruel\nnature and confesses to having willingly\nbecome Gharnef's mortal vessel.
OUTLINE2	Due to the shock from getting back part of\nher Dragonstone, Tiki falls into a deep sleep.\nHowever, time marches on.\n\nAll of Tokyo eagerly awaits Daiba TV's event\nfor their 50th anniversary: Enter-Kingdom.\n\nAs each member of Fortuna Entertainment\nparticipates in their events of expertise,\nTiki awakens from her sleep. Upon her\nawakening, Tiki is revealed to have regained\na portion of her memory.
